title: Simple Batch to insert on same row key
description: Perform a batch operation to insert a record on the same row key but other fields will gets updated. Validate the the result by selecting a record, other fields should have last updated value.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Batch insert a record with initial values.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Batch insert a record with initial values.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Batch insert a record with initial values.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, code, credited FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate that the record was inserted using batch operation

success_message: Batch insert, update, and delete validated successfully. Record is deleted as expected.
failure_message: Batch operation failed, or the record still exists after deletion.

title: Batch insert multiple tables
description: Write to multiple tables in one batch.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Batch insert a record with initial values.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.orders (user_id, order_num, name) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Batch insert a record with initial values.

operations.query: SELECT name, age FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate that the record was inserted using batch operation

operations.query: SELECT user_id, order_num, name FROM bigtabledevinstance.orders WHERE user_id = ? AND order_num = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate that the record was inserted using batch operation

success_message: Batch insert, update, and delete validated successfully. Record is deleted as expected.
failure_message: Batch operation failed, or the record still exists after deletion.

title: Batch Insert with Different Composite Keys and Values
description: Perform a batch operation to insert records with different composite keys (name + age) and different values for 'code' and 'credited'. Validate that all records are inserted correctly.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Batch insert record for Jhony.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Batch insert record for Jamess.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Batch insert record for Ronny.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, code, credited FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate record for Jhony.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, code, credited FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate record for Jamess.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, code, credited FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate record for Ronny.

success_message: Batch insert with different composite keys and values validated successfully.
failure_message: Batch operation failed, or records with different composite keys and values were not inserted correctly.

title: Insert and Update on Same Composite Key
description: Perform insert and update on the same key. Validate the updated record.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record for Steave.

operations.query: UPDATE bigtabledevinstance.user_info SET code = ? WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Update code for Steave.

operations.query: SELECT code FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate updated record for Steave.

title: Insert and Delete on Same Composite Key
description: Delete the record for Steave and validate the deletion.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, credited) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record for Steave.

operations.query: DELETE FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Delete record for Hazzlewood.

operations.query: SELECT code FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate that record for Steave is deleted.

success_message: Deletion validated successfully. Record is removed.
failure_message: Delete operation failed, or the record still exists.

title: Mixed Data Type Insert and Validate
description: Perform a batch operation to insert and validate records with mixed data types including maps, sets, and primitive types.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, credited, balance, is_active, birth_date, zip_code, extra_info, map_text_int, tags, set_float) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert a record with mixed data types including maps, sets, and primitive types.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, credited, balance, is_active, birth_date, zip_code, extra_info, map_text_int, tags, set_float FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate the inserted record with mixed data types.

success_message: Record with mixed data types inserted and validated successfully.
failure_message: Batch operation failed or record with mixed data types validation did not match expected values.

title: Mixed Data Type Batch Operations
description: Perform a series of batch operations with mixed data types, including insert, update, and delete, followed by a single validation.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, credited, balance, is_active, birth_date, zip_code, extra_info, map_text_int, tags, set_float) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert a record with mixed data types including maps, sets, and primitive types.

operations.query: UPDATE bigtabledevinstance.user_info SET credited = ?, extra_info = ?, tags = ? WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Update the credited amount, extra_info map, and tags set for the record.

operations.query: DELETE FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Delete the record based on primary key values.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, credited, extra_info, tags FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate the entire batch operation including insert, update, and delete.

success_message: Batch operation with mixed data types validated successfully.
failure_message: Batch operation failed or validation did not match expected results.

title: Batch Insert and Validate Primary Key Uniqueness
description: Perform a batch insert with records having the same primary key. Validate that only the last inserted record with the same primary key is retained.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, credited, balance, is_active) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert a record with the primary key (name, age) and initial values.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, credited, balance, is_active) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert another record with the same primary key but updated values.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, credited, balance, is_active) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert a final record with the same primary key but further updated values.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, credited, balance, is_active FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate that only the last inserted record with the same primary key is retained.

success_message: Primary key uniqueness validated successfully. Only the last inserted record is retained.
failure_message: Primary key uniqueness validation failed. More than one record with the same primary key exists, or the data is incorrect.

title: Batch Insert with Partial Record Update
description: Perform a batch operation to insert a record and partially update some fields using an insert with the same primary key.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, credited, balance, is_active) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert a record with initial values.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, balance, is_active) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert another record with the same primary key to update partial fields.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, credited, balance FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate that the record is updated partially.

success_message: Record is updated partially as expected.
failure_message: Partial update failed or record is missing.

title: Batch Insert and Validate Record with All Supported Datatypes
description: This test case inserts a record with all supported datatypes into the 'user_info' table and validates its presence using batch SELECT queries.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code, credited, balance, is_active, birth_date, zip_code, extra_info, map_text_int, map_text_bigint, map_text_boolean, map_text_ts, map_text_float, map_text_double, ts_text_map, ts_boolean_map, ts_float_map, ts_double_map, ts_bigint_map, ts_ts_map, ts_int_map, tags, set_boolean, set_int, set_bigint, set_float, set_double, set_timestamp) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
operations.query_desc: Insert record with all supported datatypes including extended map and set data.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, code, credited, balance, is_active, birth_date, zip_code FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate basic data values.

operations.query: SELECT extra_info, map_text_int, map_text_bigint, map_text_boolean, map_text_ts, map_text_float, map_text_double, ts_text_map, ts_boolean_map, ts_float_map, ts_double_map, ts_bigint_map, ts_ts_map, ts_int_map FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate all map types data.

operations.query: SELECT tags, set_boolean, set_int, set_bigint, set_float, set_double FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate all set types data.

title: Batch Operations To Validate USING TIMESTAMP and WRITETIME keyword
description: This test case performs batch operations to validate the usage of the TIMESTAMP and WRITETIME keywords in the 'user_info' table.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code) VALUES (?, ?, ?) USING TIMESTAMP ?
operations.query_desc: Insert a record with a timestamp with milliseconds value.

operations.query: INSERT INTO bigtabledevinstance.user_info (name, age, code) VALUES (?, ?, ?) USING TIMESTAMP ?
operations.query_desc: Insert a record with a timestamp with microseconds value.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, writetime(code) FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate the writetime of the 'age' column with microseconds.

operations.query: SELECT name, age, writetime(code) FROM bigtabledevinstance.user_info WHERE name = ? AND age = ?
operations.query_desc: Validate the writetime of the 'age' column with microseconds.
